author: holiman
content: For Istanbul, I maintained the tracker tracker (https://notes.ethereum.org/-1zpe9pJRuW4gZkhH3av1g) which contained links to the relevant PRs for the fork. I think it would be great if we could do the same for London, as it makes it a lot easier for someone/anyone to compare the various implementations, making auditing a lot easier. I _can_ do the same thing again, unless someone else volunteers (but I wouldn't want to do it on the london tracker, seems easier to just write the changes on notes.ethereum.org than maintain a git history).

author: holiman
content: https://notes.ethereum.org/5y1Cvr-6Rm6SSMVQ2V4x3A -- client devs please ping me with details/links
